getBusinessVATStatus(uint256,uint8,addre.details: Returns the status of the payment of the VAT for a given business owner in a given quarter and eventually the transaction associated with the payment

params._businessOwner: The address of the business owner
params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) in the given year

getQuarterVATBalance(uint256,uint8,addre.details: Returns the vat balance for a given user in a given quarter

params._businessOwner: The address of the business owner whose balance to get
params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) check in which to check the balance of the business owner

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: Initializes the contract saving the instances of the proxies of the contracts used by this contract

params._cubit: The instance of the proxy of the Cubit contract of this project
params._productTransaction: The instance of the proxy of the ProductTransaction contract of this project
params._userManager: The instance of the proxy of the UserManager contract of this project
params._vatTransaction: The instance of the proxy of the VATTransaction contract of this project

payVATToBusinessOwner(uint256,uint8,addr.details: Allows the government to pay the VAT of a given quarter to a given business owner

params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) in the given year to pay
params._year: The year of the quarter to pay

payVATToGovernment(uint256,uint8).details: Allows a business owner to pay the VAT of a given quarter to the government

params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) in the given year to pay
params._year: The year of the quarter to pay

refusePayment(uint256,uint8).details: Allows a business owner to refuse the payment of the VAT of a given quarter to the government

params._quarter: The quarter (1-4) in the given year to refuse
params._year: The year of the quarter to refuse
